January 1 2009: New New New

After a year and a half, Seth Troisi has <s>updated</s> heavily modified the code to work with Ogame 0.83. he has added a whole host of interesting features. Version 3.0 will soon be released it will be more focused on the players planets then on raiding others in the short term. the new key features will be a smart <b>planet queue</b> that will upgrade building, defense, and fleet to the specified levels even in the resources are not currently available. The new version is meant to be very competitive in new universes.
